about_the_game:
Lab 03 Yrinth : Master Levels 2


You survive the base game? Want more?
The story continue here with 10 more challenging levels on this second DLC for Lab 03 Yrinth!

CONTROLS:

*Arrows keys/WASD: Movement
*Mouse: Camera
*CTRL : Use Powerup "Speed"
*ALT: Use Powerup "Time"

*Partial controller support

FEATURES :


*Game developed with Unity Engine. (support low and high resolution, rebinding key)

*10 more difficult levels

*Steam Leaderboard :Submit your scores to our steam leaderboard, and compare and compete with your online friends.

Try to get the best score!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or greater
  • Processor: Any 64 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible All Video card
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

name: Lab 03 Yrinth : Master Levels 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Video card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
